page.title: 17Trade in Gwyddelwern
page.content: The{Post Office}and{General Store sells a wide range of domestic foodstuffs and some hardwear, it is situated on the main road. Milk is delivered via a local milkman, supplies from Chester. Two garages both{MOT Testing Stations}and repair workshop, one sells petrol,situated on main road, the other a car spray shop sells some parts and acts as small garden centre selling compost. bedding plants etc. There is a{Public {House}which also sells meals.A local {furniture maker & restorer}specialises in the production of oak furniture and kitchens and is noted for his craftsmanship. In addition there is a{joiner}and{builder,}and three {agricultural contactors,}two operating JCB's. Finally a new cottage industry is involved in producing rossettes. Mrs Celia Hayward.
